group.label: Interaction : Register integration webhooks
group.comment:
This interaction configures Brightpearl to place callbacks to this installation of Magento, facilitating the live update of order status and shipping notes.

These facilities are not essential to operation, since when the bulk importers for order status and shipping notes are configured to run, they synchsonise the same data.

This interaction only needs to be run once, and can only be executed manually. However if you run this interaction on a different Magento installation, that installation with "steal" the live updates for your account from this installation - in which case you must run the interaction on this installation again to repoint webhooks here.
